fixes.name: Total expenses to sales  Ratio
fixes.dax_expression: (SUM('CoffeeChain Query (Sample - Cof (CoffeeChain DATASET)'[Total Expenses]) / SUM('CoffeeChain Query (Sample - Cof (CoffeeChain DATASET)'[Sales])) ) * 100
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted Tableau SUM aggregates to DAX SUM and transformed column references to 'Table'[Column] format. The expression computes (SUM(Total Expenses) / SUM(Sales)) * 100 to return a percentage; it is a measure because it uses aggregations.
